info.name: Natasha-PROA-SQA-Rakamin-Week 5
info.description: This collection contains **API testing** of **Kasir Aja** features. This collection is divided into eight folders, each corresponding to a different endpoint. Every test has a successful testing example. It utilizes an environment named "baseurl", which contains the URL [https://kasir-api.belajarqa.com](https://kasir-api.belajarqa.com) ([Kasir Aja Contract](https://resource.belajarqa.com/api_contract))

item.name: Authorization

response.name: Success login

item.description:
The **authorization** folder contains API testing for the following functionalities:

1. Registering a new account
2. Logging into an account
3. Refreshing a token
4. Deleting a token

item.name: User

response.name: Success get user list
Success update user

item.description:
The **user** folder contains API testing for the following functionalities:

1. Creating a new user
2. Retrieving detailed user information
3. Getting a list of users
4. Updating user information
    
5. Deleting user

item.name: Units
item.description:
The **units** folder contains API testing for the following functionalities:

1. Adding a new user
2. Retrieving detailed unit information
3. Getting a list of units
4. Updating unit information
    
5. Deleting unit
